Plot: WINNER OF THE THRILLER CATEGORY in the 2019 Book Excellence Award! “STORM SEASON… ranging from the book's dense prose to its format, Wingate demands readers' close attention from the very first sentence to the last. But does it pay off? Absolutely. Prepare to be haunted long after turning the final page.” –BestThrillers.com Meg Storm has stepped in it. After becoming entangled within an industry as nefarious as it is criminal, she gets swept into the lurid world of drugs. After her daughter, Lily, dies from an apparent heroin overdose, and later her husband, Meg has nothing left to lose. She becomes a woman on the hunt. But will she be the hunter? Or, the hunted? If you enjoy reading books by Karin Slaughter, Gillian Flynn, and Stieg Larsson, you'll enjoy THE DEATH OF VULTURES by Susan Wingate.
